about_the_game:
It's time to prove your skills as a nuclear commander to your friends and rivals: the MULTIPLAYER mode for the nuclear war strategy game First Strike is here! Up to 10 players can play against opponents from all over the world and nuke each other into oblivion. Show the world your skills as the ultimate nuclear commander and enjoy the iconic nuclear war strategy experience with your friends and other First Strike fans.

Features:
  • Play online PvP matches with up to 10 players!
  • Choose from twelve classic superpower nations like USA, Russia or North Korea and use their special superweapons like the Tsar Bomba or Dirty Radium Bomb.
  • Host a private game and send an invite code to your friends. Or set the room to public and let other players join via the fast quickplay function.
  • Activate modifiers to even out the playing field. Pick the “Balanced Start” or “Small State Support” modifiers for a more balanced experience for all players. Or keep the different power levels of the competing nations with the “Classic Mode”.
  • Connect with allies or tease your enemies with quick emoji messages in the in-game chat.

PLEASE NOTE: Keyboard shortcuts are disabled in multiplayer

The keyboard shortcuts are deactivated in the multiplayer on purpose. The multiplayer has crossplay, which means PC players and mobile players play together. The shortcuts would be a big advantage for PC players and make it unfair for mobile players. Disabling shortcuts was a necessary compromise. The PC player base is not big enough to not have crossplay, so we have to mix the players and make it at least fair for everyone.

name: First Strike - Multiplayer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo 2.53 GHz (SSE2 instruction set support)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia® GeForce 9400M
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core i7, 2,2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia® Geforce GTX 1650 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The multiplayer mode for First Strike is here! Wage nuclear war against other players from all over the world and nuke the Earth into nuclear Armageddon together. Will you be the last one remaining when the whole world blows to smithereens?
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Italian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Arabic, Japanese, Ukrainian, Korean
